title: OPPO Reno7 5G (Starry Black, 256 GB)  (8 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, USB Cable, Charger, Sim Ejector Tool, Protective Case, Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card
product_specification.Display Type: Full HD Rigid LTPS OLED Display
product_specification.Other Display Features: 90 Hz Refresh Rate, Screen-to-Body Ratio: 90.8%, Color Saturation: 96%, Aspect Ratio: 20:9, Color Gamut: Vivid Mode: 100% DCI-P3/135% sRGB, Gentle Mode: 76% DCI-P3/103% sRGB, Contrast Ratio: Static Maximum: 500000:1, Dynamic Maximum: 1200000:1, Brightness: 430 nits, Upto 600 nits in Sunlight and Upto 800 nits when Displaying HDR or HDR10+ Contents
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Triple Camera Setup: 64MP Main Camera (OMNIVISION OV64B, 1/2.0 inch, 0.7um, 4:3, All Pixel Omni-Directional PDAF, f/1.7 Aperture, FOV: 80.5 Degree, 6P Lens, Contrast Detection Autofocus + Phase Detection Autofocus, Closed-Loop Focus Motor, 4.73 mm Effective Focal Length, 25 mm Equivalent Focal Length) + 8MP Wide Angle Camera (Sony IMX355, 1/4 inch, 1.12 um, 4:3, f/2.25 Aperture, FOV: 118.9 Degree, 5P Lens, 1.64 mm Effective Focal Length, 16 mm Equivalent Focal Length) + 2MP Macro Camera (GC02M1, 1/5 inch, 1.75 um, 4:3, f/2.4 Aperture, FOV: 88.8 Degree, 3P Lens, Fixed Focus, 1.77 mm Effective Focal Length, 22 mm Equivalent Focal Length), Camera Feature: Photo, Video, Night, Expert, Panoramic, Portrait, Time-lapse, Slow-motion, Text Scanner, Dual-view Video, Sticker, Extra HD, Macro and Soloop Templates, EIS Supported, CMOS (4 in 1 Pixel Binning Technology), 20 Burst Photos, Photo Editing: Filter, Auto Enhance, Cut & Rotate, Stickers, Doodle, Retouch, Text, Mosaic, Blur, Eraser
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 32MP Camera Setup: f/2.4 Aperture, FOV: 85 Degree, 5P Lens, Sony IMX615, 4:3, 1/2.74 inch, 0.8 um, 3.48 mm Effective Focal Length, 23 mm Equivalent Focal Length, Camera Feature: Photo, Video, Panoramic, Portrait, Night, Time-lapse, Dual-view Video, Sticker and Slow Motion, 3 Axis EIS, CMOS Sensor
product_specification.Flash: Rear: One Rear LED Light with Single Color Temperature
product_specification.Video Recording Resolution: Rear Camera: 4K (at 30 fps), 1080p (at 60 fps/30 fps), 720p (at 60 fps/30 fps), 1080p (at 120 fps), 720p (at 240 fps)| Front Camera: 1080p (at 30 fps), 720p (at 30fps), 1080p (at 120 fps), 720p (at 240 fps)
product_specification.Sensors: Geomagnetic Sensor, Proximity Sensor, Optical Sensor, Accelerometer, Gravity Sensor, Gyroscope, Pedometer
product_specification.Ringtones Format: MP3, AMR, APE, OGG, FLAC, WAV, MIDI, WMA
product_specification.Other Features: Corning Gorilla Glass 5, 10 Touch Points, Touch Sampling Rate: Maximum: 180 Hz, Default: 120 Hz, Screen Protector Type: SRF 2D High-Definition Film, Oleophobic Coating on Screen, Dark Mode, Eye Comfort, HDR Display, Dimming Mode: PWM + DC Dimming (PWM Dimming When Brightness is Less Than or Equal to 135 nits and DC Dimming When Greater Than 135 nits), OTG Storage Format: FAT32, NTFS, EXFAT, Maximum OTG Storage Supported: 2 TB, Google Lens, Widevine Key: L1 Supported, SuperVOOC 2.0, SuperVOOC, VOOC 3.0, PD (9V/2A), Water Resistance: IPX4, Material of Top Mainboard Case (Material of Middle Frame) - PC + 20% GF, Material of Bottom Mainboard Case - PC, Material of Rear Cover - Sheet Material, Oleophobic Coating on Rear Cover, File Compression and Extraction, Private Safe (File Lock), Clock Widget, Third-party App Widget, World Clock, Flashlight, Wi-Fi Display, Vibration Motor - Flat Rotor Motor, 20X Optical Zoom
product_specification.GPS Type: GPS, AGPS, BDS, GLONASS, GALILEO, QZSS
product_specification.Audio Formats: MP3, AAC, APE, AMR, WAV, MID, OGG, FLAC, WMA
product_specification.Video Formats: AVI, 3GP, MP4, WMV, MKV, MOV, ASF, FLV
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty for Phone and 6 Months Warranty for In-Box Accessories

product_description.Clarity Obsessed: With Reno7 5G’s high-resolution 64 MP triple rear camera and the 32 MP front camera powered by Sony, every image you capture comes alive.
product_description.Picture Perfect: With roughly 25 levels of adaptive blurring, bokeh, and light spot size, Portrait Mode brings the character in the frame to focus with precisely blurred backgrounds and captures your fond memories in an infinite DSLR-Esque style.
product_description.Intelligent Photography: Thanks to Smart Skin Tone Protection AI, your video subject will always shine out in front of the elegantly blurred background.
product_description.Smart AI: This phone's AI analyses scenarios automatically and activates Ultra Night or Live HDR to ensure that all of your moments are captured in clear and vivid detail. In this manner, you can produce magnificent masterpieces no matter how severe the exterior environment is or how poorly illuminated the place is.
product_description.Intense Design: This phone employs LDI (Laser Direct Imaging) processing which is commonly used in the semiconductor industry, to offer accurate touch. In addition, with approximately 1.2 million micro-lines, this phone's design is inspired by meteor showers.
product_description.Fingerprint-proof Finish: A delicate but refined texture is created employing millions of pyramid-shaped crystal structures carefully ordered using LDI, all while staying exquisitely fingerprint-proof.
product_description.Light and Robust: Weighing around 173 g and with a thickness of 7.81 mm, the curved 3D back design is meant to accommodate a single palm. This phone is designed to provide you with an airy feel, making it convenient to hold for extended periods of time whether shooting a detailed photograph or playing your favourite game.
product_description.Protection with Performance: With an Eye-Care certified display and a large, dynamic, and colourful screen powered by a quick 90 Hz refresh rate, you can engage in the online realm without straining your eyes.
product_description.Unparalleled Processor: Owing to the 6 nm Octa-core 5G CPU, you can enjoy a seamless 5G experience. This phone is equipped with blazing-fast Wi-Fi 6, so you won't have to worry about buffering when watching your favourite shows.
product_description.Memory Expansion: This device has an impressive 8 GB of RAM and allows you to quickly turn your unused storage into RAM, expandable up to 5 GB. You can easily store additional games and movies, ensuring that you are constantly amused by its performance.
product_description.Smooth Operation: You can experience seamless functioning at any time of day with Reno7's AI System Booster. This phone's certified smooth functionality enables you to multitask without sacrificing performance.
product_description.Robust Battery: This phone sports a 65 W SUPER VOOC charger that can power up the 4500 mAh battery in approximately 31 minutes.
product_description.Stability Sustained: Thanks to Hyperboost's AI Frame Rate Stabilizer, this phone reduces frame-rate loss and latency. Also, the Quick Startup function returns you to where you left off, so that the fun is limitless.
product_description.Game Hard: You can enjoy a lengthy gaming session with multi-layer graphite sheets, a liquid cooling system, and Borazon insulation that stops your phone from overheating throughout your hard gaming session.
product_description.Inquisitive Design: ColorOS 12's UI has distinctive 3D icon images that are visually tactile and delightful, to top it up, this boasts a universal design that works with multiple dialects.
product_description.Omoji Fun: Using breakthrough face-capture technology that identifies dynamic facial expressions, you can create your own interactive Omoji and represent your inner self.
product_description.Seamless Connectivity: You can effortlessly connect your phone to your PC using this phone and transfer the essential files across the devices. Additionally, you can also project your phone's screen to your display, for a flawless connection.
product_description.Solitude Enhanced: This phone identifies other faces and conceals alerts when someone else looks at your phone screen. You can simply unwind and enjoy your privacy without worrying about your whereabouts.
product_description.Safe and Secure: This phone protects your private data and has international privacy and security protections to keep your data safe from potential hackers.

review:
Pros:
1. Supports 13 5G Bands
2. Has a Dedicated Triple Card slot
3. Supports WiFi 6 (5.8Ghz)
4. Has the 3.5mm headphone jack
5. Has 90Hz Amoled instead of IPS LCD
6. Runs on modified ColorOS where some Oppo apps are replaced by Google apps. Bloatwares can be uninstalled.
7. Supports Flash and AI in 64MP mode.
8. Supports System Cloner where apps can be installed with different sets of credentials.
9. 65W charging works quite well.
10. ORoaming supports 5G data.
11. Phone is NFC certified.

Cons:
1. Photo quality is not great
2. Display is not bright enough
3. Although it is ColorOS 12, the Android version is 11, which is an anomaly.
4. Screen size is quite small, having a big chin.
5. Macro lens doesn't work well.
6. Single output speakers, no stereo.
7. Dual/Clone Apps are not visible using 3rd party launchers.
8. Phone is suitable as a daily driver but not for gaming or heavy usage.
9. The color-changing back is just a gimmick.


I would recommend this phone only if you need a device that has multi-5G bands + Dedicated SDXC Slot + Ultrawide lens + Punch-hole display (all together).
Else there are better options available for this price.

Oppo Reno 7 is so good!!! The screen touch is like an iOS phone and the photos are having amazing quality and clarity! You are getting a great RAM + 256 GB in such an attractive price!! Must buy and I am an Oppo user forever!! My last oppo phone was Oppo f11 pro which was super amazing and now this is topping my list!! Go for it guys

Expected better phone since I have even opted for pre-order in anticipation of the specifications mentioned, but it's just average. Totally disappointed. Camera in low light has some lagging and doesn't focus quick enough, needs a better camera performance.lookwise the back panel gradient seems to be normal and nothing fancy. Other low budget phones are coming with better classy back panels.LGI gradient? seriously? Overall performance is decent. Storage is ok, no orbit breathing light in this which is disappointing considering it was not clearly advertised that it comes only with reno 7 pro and not with the basic one..edge lighting is just not fair. Now I don't know how I'm going to manage with this phone for some years, considering there is no return and refund policy available.

Nice camara phone
Display quality is best
Speaker is powerful
Little bit not satisfied with battery , but fast charging
Over all best phone in the this range ....☺️☺️☺️

Folks, this phone is Pure AVOID!! writing this review after 2 days of usage. Have been MI / Redmi user for past few years, switched for a better experience (on Hearsay), made a mistake, which others can avoid.

Pros:
Camera is better than my earlier phone rest everything is average / below average.
Fast charging

Cons:
Battery backup is purely HALF DAY not anything more than that.
Phone missing many features, which other models by competitors in this range even in lower costs handsets are available (e.g. - IR Blaster, which is available is most of the handsets these days)
Phone comes with Color OS 11, and soon after you set up / personalize the phone comes the OS 12 update – Loss of time, data and again need to set up the apps
Call recording feature is missing
Has only single speaker, while handsets in this price range have dual speakers now days
Display is not bright enough
Night Mode is useless
Nokia’s feature phone’s Flash Light is brighter than Reno 7 5G flash light
Keyboard is not smooth


Cheating – Flipkart no return policy available

The phone feels outstanding in hands. The camera is the beast in this price segment. 65 watt charger works fantastically but the battery doesn't meet the expectations. It drains fast without any heavy use. Overall the is good....!

I bought it for camera purpose but back camera did nt match any expectations...camera surrounding breathing light should be there in normal varrient also...edge lighting did not work...charging super fast .. performance good ..

Pros
1. Camera - Rear and front camera gives stunning photos
2. Storage - 256 GB. Good enough to store songs, photos, videos and download movies.
3. Battery & Charging - 4500 mah battery. Fast charging, makes life easy with charging completes in less time. Max 35 mints to charge between 10 - 100%.
4. Performance - All apps open in quick time. No lag found.
5. Coloros 12 - lots of customisation in UI.
6. Design - slim and light weight

Cons
1. No FM radio
2. No IR blaster
3. Mono speakers / No Stereo speakers - Phone vibrates if set at high volume.
4. Build quality - Back made of plastic (Reno 7 5G)
5. Theme store - Not working, most are paid.
It's good at the price range offered but battery is actually draining out little faster and camera could have been even better .other than that this is a super cool phone with premium product feels

Mobile is very good except call and sms app provided by Google, this app is not better than previous Oppo calling and sms app. Call recording not working in Google calling app. So required oppo calling and sms app in oppo mobile.
Other features like camera is very good.

Simple phone with some special features.
I ordered Reno series smartphone for its flagship level qualities. But somehow it disappointed me. It should provide mediatek dimensity 920 beacause at this price all phones providing this. It also comes with full hd display not FHD+ reno 6 come with FHD+ display.
Also camera is simple (Omnivision not Sony). Front camera is performing quite good. Specially portraits. Day to day performance of the phone is good. Battery backup is great and charges fast with supervooc. It comes with a big storage option of 256 gb which is good but it would be better if given UFS 3.1 but it only UFS 2.2. Its UI is best.It's a simple phone not flagship level better options available in the market in this price range..

Friends I have used Oppo Reno 7 k for around 10 days. My point wise review is as follows.
1) Performance is good ..I have not seen any frame drops while playing COD mobile at Max frame rates. Also there is no heating issue.
2) Battery backup is really good. It gave me approximate 7-8 hrs of screen on time. With the fast charger given in box it charges very fast approx in half an hour.
3) Back camera is good. It can capture good images. Video stabilisation is ok at 30 FPS full Hd. Front camera is just average for selfies. I would suggest those persons who want a Camera phone to avoid this mobile and go for Samsung for satisfaction.
4) Display quality is good. There is one bug that in outdoor visibility the light sensor does not work many times and I have to drag it manually to full brightness. Also outdoor visibility is not great. It's peak brightness is slightly on lower side.
5) Design is ok not very premium. But the device is thin and light weight so very comfortable to use and hold.
6) There are many bloatware apps. Many apps can be deleted but still some cannot be uninstalled. But it's ok.
7) My suggestion is if you are getting this mobile in 20k or less than you can think over it.. This oppo reno 7 is surely overpriced at 29 k .

After using this phone for 4 days i can say that this phone is superb, much better than redmi or Samsung phone s in this range. My last phone was redmi note 7 pro which has sony imx sensor. This phone also has sony sensors so the quality of the image is amazing. Night mode, macro mode, zoom mode, portrait mode all are almost accurate.
Display is fine, although it has only one speaker but sound quality is much good and loud, although it has 4500 mAh battery but the charge lasts for almost two days. Only 25 mins required to charge battery from 20% to 100%. No heating issues found till now. The dimensions of the set is very pocket friendly.
Happy with performance, camera is too good. In screen fingerprint working very smooth. Display is very smooth. Mobile is very weightless, Totally happy with the Reno 7.
